title: Textile, ca. 1750
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: satin and other embroidery stitches with braid on taffeta
dimensions: H x W (in frame): 83 x 69 cm (32 11/16 x 27 3/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: White taffeta embroidered in colored silks (satin and other stitches) with narrow white silk braid; design, scrolls, flowers and birds.

Textile, ca. 1750.Medium: silk on silk
Technique: satin and other embroidery stitches with braid on taffeta. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1928-16-30.
